metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43861 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Mermaid is a Javascript based diagramming and charting tool that usesMarkdown-inspired text definitions and a renderer to create and modifycomplex diagrams. Prior to version 8.13.8, malicious diagrams can runjavascript code at diagram readers' machines. Users should upgrade toversion 8.13.8 to receive a patch. There are no known workarounds asidefrom upgrading.

criterions.comment: node-mermaid package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
